title: Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard - 155 cm
description: The Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard in 155 cm is a versatile all-mountain board designed for riders who seek top performance in a range of conditions. Featuring the Flying V profile, this snowboard combines the best of rocker and camber for a balanced and responsive ride. The Super Fly II 700G core and Dualzone EGD construction ensure a lightweight yet durable design, perfect for tackling everything from groomed runs to powder days. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just getting started, the Custom Flying V delivers smooth, stable, and playful performance. Don’t miss out on this exceptional snowboard!
meta_title: Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard - 155 cm | All-Mountain Snowboard
meta_description: Shop the Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard in 155 cm for versatile all-mountain performance. Featuring Flying V profile, Super Fly II 700G Core, and more. Special offer available!

title: Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard - 160 cm
description: Get ready for an incredible ride with the Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard in 160 cm. This board features the Flying V profile, which offers a combination of rocker and camber for a smooth and responsive experience. With the Super Fly II 700G core and Dualzone EGD construction, the Custom Flying V provides excellent durability and performance across various snow conditions. The 160 cm length is perfect for riders who prefer a slightly longer board for added stability and control. Ideal for all-mountain adventures, this snowboard offers the perfect blend of versatility and performance.
meta_title: Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard - 160 cm | High-Performance Snowboard
meta_description: Discover the Burton Custom Flying V Snowboard in 160 cm for a high-performance all-mountain ride. Features Flying V profile, Super Fly II 700G Core, and more. Special discount available!
